cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on April 5, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6930, Asset Seizure for Ukraine Reconstruction Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 39 (Thursday, March 3, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MALINOWSKI:
H.R. 6930.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the Constitution of the
United States
[Page H1303]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Asset Seizure for Ukraine Reconstruction Act
